ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 316
ygData.msgSnippet: The cost is around 45pp, the gloves sell back for 38ish (with 102 cha, don t remember what kind of faction I have with my gnomish vendor brothers. Never
ygData.messageBody:
The cost is around 45pp, the gloves sell back for 38ish (with 102 cha, don't
remember
what kind of faction I have with my gnomish vendor brothers. Never bothered
to raise
it really). I've just today raised the skill to 122 with them, so I can
confirm this trivial
point.

----- Original Message -----
From: Jason Smith <jason@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, September 18, 2000 10:56 PM
Subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 316


>
> +5 Str, Gnome only item... Anyone know the cost per attempt?
> Zebbi (56 Gnome Wiz) ECi
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Ryan Dudley [mailto:ryan.dudley@...]
> Sent: Monday, September 18, 2000 1:49 PM
> To: EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 316
>
>
>
> Could any one tell me what these new gloves can do?
> Thank you for your Infomation.
>
> Felbin D'Spenser
> 35 Magi Rodcet Knife
>
> Tekdruid wrote:
> >
> >
> > Sorry about that last message. Egroups must have done something to it
> that
> > cause my sig no not like it. At any rate, this recipe does work. I
read
> it
> > on Fulcrum's message board from someone who found it in the EQ strategy
> > guide, so I tried it out. Here it is:
> >
> > 1 steel lined gloves
> > 1 sprockets
> > 1 gears
> > 1 metal twine
> > 1 firewater
> >
> > Tinik
> >
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Joe D [mailto:joed@...]
> > Sent: Monday, September 18, 2000 9:42 AM
> > To: EQ_Tinkering@egroups.com
> > Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Digest Number 316
> >
> > >
> > > Powered Gloves? What's the recipie?!?
> > >
> > There isn't one. This is from the Community Recipes, where people are
> > tossing out things they'd like to see.
